messages.content: is a father in law considered a relative
Yes, a father-in-law is considered a relative. Relatives include immediate family, extended family, and in-laws, such as parents-in-law, brothers-in-law, and sisters-in-law.
is air canada part of one world alliance
No, Air Canada is not part of the oneworld alliance. It is a member of the Star Alliance, which is another major global airline alliance.
is the united states a part of the european union

No, the United States is not part of the European Union. The European Union is a political and economic union consisting primarily of countries in Europe. The U.S. is a separate nation located in North America.
will there be a season 7 of puss in boots on netflix
As of now, there's no news about a seventh season of "The Adventures of Puss in Boots" on Netflix. Keep an eye on Netflix's announcements or official DreamWorks sources for any updates.
are all the angles equal in a parallelogram

No, not all the angles in a parallelogram are equal. A parallelogram has opposite angles that are equal. Additionally, the adjacent angles in a parallelogram are supplementary, meaning they add up to 180 degrees. If all four angles are equal, the parallelogram is a special type called a rectangle, where each angle measures 90 degrees.
is durham university part of the russell group
Yes, Durham University is a member of the Russell Group, which is a prestigious association of 24 leading research-intensive universities in the UK.
is israel part of the european economic area

No, Israel is not part of the European Economic Area (EEA). The EEA includes European Union (EU) member states as well as three of the four European Free Trade Association (EFTA) states: Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein. Israel does have various trade agreements with the EU, but it is not a member of the EEA.
will there be episode 9 of sacred games

As of now, there is no official announcement about a season 3 or an episode 9 of "Sacred Games." The series concluded with eight episodes in its second season. Any updates on further episodes would depend on announcements from the creators or Netflix.
is a yard the same as a meter

No, a yard and a meter are not the same. A yard is a unit of length used primarily in the United States and is equivalent to 3 feet or 36 inches. A meter is the standard unit of length in the metric system. One yard is approximately 0.9144 meters, and conversely, one meter is approximately 1.0936 yards.
is in n out only located in california

No, In-N-Out Burger is not only located in California. While it started in California and most of its locations are there, the chain has expanded to other states, including Nevada, Arizona, Utah, Texas, Oregon, and Colorado.
